title: Better Call Saul
description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill before his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

title: Chernobyl
description: A dramatization of the true story of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the cleanup efforts that followed.

title: Criminal Minds
description: An elite team of FBI profilers analyzes the countrys most twisted criminal minds to anticipate their next moves.

title: Dexter
description: By day, Dexter is a forensic blood spatter expert. By night, he is a serial killer who targets other murderers.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros while an ancient enemy returns.

title: House M.D.
description: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases.

title: Law & Order
description: Follows a crime, usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points â€” the police and the district attorneys.

title: Lucifer
description: Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, relocates to Los Angeles and opens a nightclub while also consulting for the LAPD.

title: NCIS
description: Follows a team of special agents from the Naval Criminal Investigative Service investigating crimes involving the Navy and Marine Corps.

title: Peacemaker
description: Peacemaker returns home after recovering from his injuries and joins a mysterious organization to fight for peace at any cost.

title: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in deadly childrens games.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

title: Supernatural
description: Two brothers follow in their fathers footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds.

title: The Flash
description: After a lightning strike, Barry Allen wakes up with super speed and becomes the Flash, fighting crime and other metahumans.

title: The Mentalist
description: Patrick Jane, a former psychic medium, uses his keen observation skills to help the CBI solve crimes.

title: The Rookie
description: A middle-aged man joins the LAPD as a rookie officer and navigates the dangerous, unpredictable world of law enforcement.

title: The Vampire Diaries
description: A teenage girl is caught between two vampire brothers in a town full of supernatural beings and secrets.

title: The Walking Dead
description: Sheriff Rick Grimes wakes from a coma to find a post-apocalyptic world dominated by zombies and bands of survivors.

title: Wednesday
description: Wednesday Addams investigates a series of murders at her school while discovering her psychic abilities.

title: Young Sheldon
description: Meet a young Sheldon Cooper, a child genius growing up in East Texas, trying to fit in with his family and classmates.
